title: Roscoe Wallace, Robert Kraft, Game of Thrones, Cardi B. and more.
itunes:title: Roscoe Wallace, Robert Kraft, Game of Thrones, Cardi B. and more.
description:
Welcome to the ride this Humpday.  Is Big Dog actually talking about Jodeci?  Roscoe Wallace stops by the show gives us history lessons.  If Patriots owner Robert Kraft plays his cards right, he just might receive a get of jail free card.  Tynesha Evans of Georgia was a single mother who was killed by her boyfriend.  Her family is now being taken care of by Tyler Perry himself.  Trump gets slammed by the late John McCain's daughter for continually dragging her father's name through the mud.  Mike Trout of the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim has a $430 million contract that has Pastor Motown reminiscing about his 27 year old self.  Game of Thrones star Kit Harington opens up about his struggle with fame.  Cardi B., will be making her motion picture debut with Jenny from the block and Taraji P. talks about her role in Empire and what to look forward to.  Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve talks about the one thing that always plays a role in his daily life and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
